Welcome to Filin Students’ infrastucture documentation!¶

The infrastucture is object oriented. There are two main data-set objects ( PointSet, and RasterData)which are being inherited to create new data-set objects (PointSetOpen3D, PointsSubSet).

These data-set objects have a basic set of properties, Factory objects and Property objects. The Property objects relate to the data-set, and are built by a Factory object. In each Factory there can be several functions that build the same property, but with a different algorithm and / or with different data-class.

Visualization is applicable through Visualization Classes.

Other general utilities are in MyTools.

Dependencies¶

This project is implemented for Python 3.6

  • pyProj.

    Installation via pip install pyproj

  • vtk

    Installation via pip install vtk

  • opencv

    Installation via pip install opencv-python

  • geopandas

    Installation via conda install -c conda-forge geopandas

  • gdal

    Installation via pip install GDAL

  • pyspark

    Make sure you have Java 8 or higher installed on your computer.

    Installation via pip install pyspark

[Zei08] R. Zeibak. Change detection via terrestrial laser scanning. Master’s thesis, Technion - Israel Institute of Technology, Haifa, April 2008.
